resources.string: Accomplished app is an unique app for habit tracking. This app makes managing mutliple habits at once simple without sacrificing more advanced features. With simple interface, Accomplished provides multiple options for checking a habits. You can customize your habits separating them by categories, where each category has its own activites. If you need to customize your activities for tracking activities like reading or meditating for a certain period you can create an time activity and use timer for it. Also, if youâ€™re trying to get your steps in or drink more water, by quantity type of activity Accomplished allows you to enter units of measurement and track your habits. Also there is an unique way to follow your progress by increment type of activity. So, if you are bad with completing and planning your habits, Accomplished will be good greate choice for you.
